name: TeachAvenue
overview:
TeachAvenue.com is a dynamic online community that brings smart learners and great teachers together. Whether you want to learn, teach or develop your network of experts you will find your space with us.

At TeachAvenue you can post classifieds and publish almost anything related to your expertise. You can get more Students for your teaching activity, give knowledge for free or for fees or swap it for something you want to learn. What else? You can Advertise your classes, workshops, conferences etc., and use videos, groups and blogs to provide an in-depth knowledge experience to potential Students and Followers. This is an excellent platform from which you can create many opportunities and everything is free.

What else? You can Advertise your classes, workshops, conferences etc., and use videos and blogs to provide an in-depth knowledge experience to potential Students and Followers. This is an excellent platform from which you can create many opportunities.

Joining TeachAvenue is absolutely free, and it takes only a few minutes to register. Once you become a member.You can take advantage of all of TeachAvenue ‘s features and benefits. Members can: â€¢ Review classes: Students can spread the word about classes they love, or get the scoop on a course they’ve been thinking about taking. And teachers can promote their work with starred reviews that tout their skills. â€¢ Search (and be found) with ease: No more wasting hours online trying to find a class, or bugging friends for a lead. TeachAvenue makes it easy to search thousands of local classes, by subject or teacher. â€¢ Achieve your goals: Teachers can grow their businesses while doing what they love; and students can browse articles, take classes, and get the resources they need to learn something new. â€¢ Make your brain bigger â€¢ Whether it’s a new language, a musical instrument or rocket science - learn new things and get really clever

Join now at www.TeachAvenue.com, it takes less than 1 minute to register and everything is free!
